description: FastAPI router module defining CRUD API endpoints for managing 'notes' in a note-taking application, including functions for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, along with data transformation and dependency injection.

methods.name: NoteOut _to_note_out(note: Note)
methods.description: Converts a Note object to a NoteOut schema for API responses.

methods.name: NoteOut create_note(payload: NoteCreate, user_id: str = Depends(require_auth))
methods.description: Creates a new note for the current user using provided payload.

methods.name: List[NoteOut] list_notes(user_id: str = Depends(require_auth))
methods.description: Fetches and returns all notes for the current user.

methods.name: NoteOut get_note( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note"), user_id: str = Depends(require_auth), )
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID.

methods.name: NoteOut update_note( payload: NoteUpdate, note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note"), user_id: str = Depends(require_auth), )
methods.description: Updates a note's title and/or content based on provided payload.

methods.name: None delete_note( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note"), user_id: str = Depends(require_auth), )
methods.description: Deletes a specific note by ID.

ctags.name: create_note
ctags.pattern: /^def create_note(payload: NoteCreate, user_id: str = Depends(require_auth)) -> NoteOut:$/

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note"), user_id: str = Depends(require_auth), )

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note"), user_id: str = Depends(require_auth), )

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.signature: ( payload: NoteUpdate, note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note"), user_id: str = Depends(require_auth), )
